message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is more fair, considering the inflation affecting me. Let's see if you agree.
Bob, time is running out and inflation is hurting you. Let's compromise - 55/45.
I'm willing to meet you halfway on your previous offer.  55/45 is a reasonable compromise, considering the inflation.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous. 52/48 is my final offer.
